snippet.title: How Mustard Gas Works: Mustard Gas After World War I
snippet.description: Iranian chemical weapon victim exposed to Iraqi mustard gas during the Iran-Iraq war, breathes through a respirator. Tens of thousands of Iranians...

snippet.title: How Sarin Works: Lots More Information
snippet.description: It's a chemical nerve agent with no taste, color, or scent, but it can be devastating even in minuscule amounts. Find out how sarin works.... "Sarin." (Sep. 13, 2013) http://cameochemicals.noaa.gov/chemical/5170 Carmichael, Helen. "French Convinced Sarin Used in Syria...
